channel.title: Making NPC's face a given direction?
channel.description: Hi, I'm using Satan's Isle and I really want npcs to face different directions instead of always South which looks really stupid. Can anyone give me any tips on how I can do this?

Hi,
I’m using Satan’s Isle and I really want npcs to face different directions instead of always South which looks really stupid. Can anyone give me any tips on how I can do this?
